#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    string a="";
    vector<char> x;
    int siz=0,len=0;
    
    getline(cin,a);
    
    len = a.length();
    
    for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
    {
     if(a[i]=='a'||a[i]=='e'||a[i]=='i'||a[i]=='o'||a[i]=='u')
       {
       x.push_back(a[i]);
       i+=2;
       }
     else
       x.push_back(a[i]);
       }
       
       siz=x.size();
       
       for(int i=0;i<siz;i++)
         cout << x[i];
         cout << endl;
       
       return 0;
       //system("pause");
       }
